CSS Selectors

Select the rainbow marbles. You are not allowed to use any of the following selectors

  • :nth-child
  • :nth-last-child
  • :nth-of-type
  • :nth-last-of-type
  • [data-target]
  • any use of + or ~ or add additional selectors (also not with ,)
